name: Treasured Flower
desc:
A wild flower that a Hilichurl Rogue treasured, bereft of any special qualities.
Flowers can be used as gifts or offerings to express one's feelings in many cultures.

customize.name: Hydro Hilichurl Rogue
customize.desc:
Hilichurl wanderers unaffiliated with any specific tribe. They can often be found roving the wilds as if in voluntary exile.
They may also lend their aid to other hilichurls or hilichurl tribes for various reasons and go their separate ways afterward. They seem to possess a higher level of intelligence than commonplace hilichurls.

customize.name: Anemo Hilichurl Rogue
customize.desc:
Hilichurl wanderers who do not belong to any hilichurl tribe. It almost seems as if they are searching for the fated genesis of their kind, seeking to uncover some bygone splendor that once belonged to their people.
If these monsters capable of only crude language and bereft of missing history could record their own epics and legends, the hilichurl wanderers would be the heroes in said tales.

customize.name: Treasured Flower
customize.desc:
A wild flower that a Hilichurl Rogue treasured, bereft of any special qualities.
Flowers can be used as gifts or offerings to express one's feelings in many cultures.

customize.name: Masterless Stardust
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Treasured Flower
customize.desc:
A wild flower that a Hilichurl Rogue treasured, bereft of any special qualities.
Flowers can be used as gifts or offerings to express one's feelings in many cultures.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: A Flower Yet to Bloom
customize.desc:
A wild flower that a Hilichurl Rogue treasured. It was plucked before it could bloom.

The hilichurl takes nothing with it in its sojourn across the wilderness save this flower.

customize.name: Wanderer's Blooming Flower
customize.desc:
A blooming wild flower that a Hilichurl Rogue treasured, bereft of any special qualities.

The eternal outlander asks not for reward, but only to see their deeds come to fruition...
